ygData.subject: Re: Rumor of the bards ultimate weapon?
ygData.msgSnippet: How does a weapon that procs gate make any sense at all? ... -- Artificial Intelligence stands no chance against Natural Stupidity. GAT d- -p+(--) c++++ l++
ygData.messageBody:
How does a weapon that procs gate make any sense at all?


On Wed, Oct 27/99, Ben Wilson <ruldaas@...> wrote:
> From: "Ben Wilson" <ruldaas@...>
>
> I found the link. The picture is real but a quill? I would think the bards
> ultimate weapon would be more related to music. Though a quill could be
> used to write musics it just sounds a little cheesy to me. It's fun to
> speculate though.
>
> http://members.tripod.co.uk/frogggystyle/maestro.jpg
>
> >From: "CYR, Thierry" <tcyr@...>
> >Reply-To: eqbards@onelist.com
> >To: "'eqbards@onelist.com'" <eqbards@onelist.com>
> >Subject: RE: [eqbards] Rumor of the bards ultimate weapon?
> >Date: Wed, 27 Oct 1999 14:50:44 -0400
> >
> >can you upload it to the net and post the link on the list plz
> >
> >Minkin
> >sol ro
> >
> > > -----Original Message-----
> > > From: Ben Wilson [SMTP:ruldaas@...]
> > > Sent: Wednesday, October 27, 1999 2:48 PM
> > > To: eqbards@onelist.com
> > > Subject: [eqbards] Rumor of the bards ultimate weapon?
> > >
> > > From: "Ben Wilson" <ruldaas@...>
> > >
> > > A fellow bard has heard rumor of a bard only "ultimate" weapon called
> >the
> > > quill that procs gate. He says it is found in the Plane of Hate on the
> > > Maestro of Rancor. I'm skeptical by nature but he also sent me along a
> > > screenshot of this Maestro character in front of a huge organ. Anyone
> > > else
> > > hear about this? I've got the screenshot if anyone wants to see it.
> > >
> > > Ruldaas Riverdance bard of The Rathe
> > >
> > > > Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to
> >toren@...
> > > with the subject lol.
